name: Quran Reciter
short_description:
I found that most browser-based reciters keep downloading audio and image resources to browser cache and if this cache is cleared you will not be able to listen to the same part again offline or at least will need to re-download everything again, and because high quality audio files take a large storage space it gets frequently deleted from the cache, so I decided to develop a simple tool for Quran recitation and memorization that will stream resources on demand and keep reusing it locally, let's help each other to make a better life and hereafter, remember each verse you know got duties for you and is either your proof or a proof against you, so get activated !

(Any suggestions are welcome, please report any issues you find, feature suggestions are most welcome, if you found this program helpful please share it and remember all these Hasanat coming for you and me whenever it recites Quran even after this short life is over.)

Download from google drive https://goo.gl/Nh4uJ3
